text: The past can be a great teacher, but it can also be a terrible prison
author: Avatar Aang

text: Harsh words can't solve problems; action will
author: Avatar Aang

text: You are not a failure until you give up
author: Prince Zuko

text: Even though you'll probably fail over and over and over again...you have to try every time. You can't quit because you're afraid you might fail.
author: Prince Zuko

text: The strength of your heart makes you who you are
author: Katara

text: There's always a right way to do things
author: Katara

text: Sometimes it hurts more to hope, and it hurts more to care
author: Katara

text: It've always had to struggle and fight, it's made me who I am
author: Prince Zuko

text: With fierce determination, passion, and hard work, you can accomplish anything. Raw talent is not enough
author: Pakku

text: This tea is nothing but hot leaf juice!.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Failure is only the opportunity to begin again. Only this time, more wisely.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place it becomes rigid and stale.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: You must never give into despair. Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader
author: Uncle Iroh

text: You must never give into despair. Allow yourself to slip down that road and you surrender to your lowest instincts. In the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: There is nothing wrong with letting people who love you help you.
author: Uncle Iroh

text: While it is great to believe in one self, a little help from others can be a great blessing
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Power and perfection are overrated. I think you are wise to choose happiness and love
author: Uncle Iroh

text: My cabbages! My cabbages!
author: The Cabbage Merchant

text: Drink cactus juice. It'll quench ya. Nothing's quenchier. It's the quenchiest!
author: Sokka

text: Are you so busy fighting you cannot see your own ship has set sail?
author: Uncle Iroh

text: Do or do not, there is no try.
author: Master Yoda

text: Size matters not.
author: Master Yoda

text: If you choose the quick and easy path you will become an agent of evil.
author: Master Yoda

text: You must confront your fears.
author: Master Yoda

text: The greatest teacher, failure is.
author: Master Yoda

text: You must unlearn what you have learned.
author: Master Yoda

text: That's the funny thing about hope, no one gets to decide when you feel it.
author: Rumi (KPop Demon Hunters)

text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: And if men come unto me I will show unto them their weakness. I give unto men weakness that they may be humble.
author: Ether 12:27

text: When ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God.
author: Mosiah 2:17

text: I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded.
author: 1 Nephi 3:7

text: Life before death. Strength before weakness. Journey before destination.
author: The Way of Kings, Brandon Sanderson

text: The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem.
author: Captain Jack Sparrow

text: Not all treasure is silver and gold, mate.
author: Captain Jack Sparrow

text: If you were waiting for the opportune moment, that was it.
author: Captain Jack Sparrow

text: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: There is some good in this world, and it’s worth fighting for.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
author: Philippians 4:13

text: With God all things are possible.
author: Matthew 19:26

text: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
author: Matthew 5:16

text: Curse you McDuck!
author: Flintheart Glomgold

text: Ha! Bears will kill you!
author: Jackie

text: Dessert is never enough if it’s not too much!
author: Jackie

text: Not today Satan! Nuh-uh!
author: Lizzie

text: We need to make more cookies! People are dying in this city! Do you hear this!?
author: Lizzie

text: Bacon is just too delicious for me to bear!
author: Lizzie

text: What!? It has a cupholder!? This [treadmill] is even more epic than I'd imagined!
author: Tori

text: This omelet feels like it has too much cheese, which is just enough in my world!
author: Tori

text: Outside it smells like dogs. And do you know what dogs smell like? Dog poop, and wonderful happiness!
author: Lizzie

author: Lizzie
